articles.title: World leaders pledge to redouble pandemic fight at special APEC meeting - GMA News Online
articles.description: Leaders of the Asia-Pacific trade group APEC, including US President Joe Biden, Russia's Vladimir Putin, and China's Xi Jinping, pledged on Friday to work to expand sharing and manufacturing of COVID-19 vaccines to fight the global pandemic.
